org.clusternet.chat

Class ThreadSesionMulticast

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.clusternet.chat.ThreadSesionMulticast
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ClusterNetConnectionListener, ClusterNetGroupListener, ClusterNetMemberListener, ClusterNetRxDataListener

    public class ThreadSesionMulticast
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ClusterNetConnectionListener, ClusterNetRxDataListener, ClusterNetGroupListener, ClusterNetMemberListener
    Clase ThreadSesionMulticast. Gestiona la conexión Multicast.
